1st I pleased to say the off shoulder blouse stays put , doesn't Ride up unlike others and still allows you to move arms comfortablely while staying put.  The size is true to what is stated, I went with a medium despite usually going up a size after reading reviews , thank you for all that reviewed. The fabric isn't scratchy but also isn't a cotton blend but helps in the way it compliments curves. Can be tied tighter or on lose side great in coverage of a belly & love handles I would think it would compliment most body styles.  Looks good dressed up or dressed down w/ pair of jeans. Hope this was some help to those trying to decide, I'm very happy with the black choice.

I was very pleasantly surprised to find this top comfortable, attractive, and a perfect fit.  I am almost 5'5", 128 Lbs., and 36D chest.  I ordered the medium and it couldn't be more comfortable.  Color is also spot on.  Here's a hint for wearing over the shoulder blouses:  Buy some thin elastic band (Walmart), and sew it from one side of armpit area to the other.  That way, when you slide your arm through the elastic then through the sleeve, the elastic under your arm keeps sleeve  from constantly crawling back up off shoulder.  The sleeves will rest on your shoulder, where they are supposed to be, for the duration..  Your welcome!  lol

This shirt is like crepe! If you want a true off the shoulder top, this is it!  No adjusting or having to keep pulling down off your shoulders.  The top is made to be off the shoulder and the print and colors are so vibrant!  I like the front tie also! It helps to slenderize the look! Plan on going back to order some more.
